title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6659.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6659.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Chapter: (a) Director shall mean the Director of the

State Office for the Aging. (b) Council shall mean the advisory council to the recreation program for the
elderly established under section
542
of the

Executive Law. (c) Elderly person
shall mean a person 60 years of age or older. (d) Municipality shall mean a legally
constituted county, city, town or village. (e) Nonprofit agency shall mean a corporation
organized pursuant to the Not- for-Profit Corporation Law. (f) Program period shall mean the annual
period covered by a municipality's application, and shall be the New York State
fiscal year (April 1st through March 31st). (g) Recreation program shall mean all
programs or activities conducted pursuant to section 543 of the Executive

Law. (h) Resident shall mean an
elderly person who inhabits or has a place of residence located within the
municipality (or municipalities) sponsoring the local recreation program being
operated under this Chapter. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6659.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
